extendedInfo.description: Night Community helps you to find the right place to go out.It works in two different ways :1) You can use it to read and write the last reviews about a club/pub. By using this app you get information such as :- If thereÂ´s a queue and how long it takes to come in.- What type of music they play there right now.- If there is a lot of people inside.2) You can use it as a club/pub researcher. The Application has a Google GPS system that shows your location on a map and the nightclubs around you. You can simply :- Search for information and reviews abouts clubs and locate them on the map.- Add your own club if itÂ´s not on the map.This App works basically everywhere, itÂ´s fun, quick and easy to use.By writing as many reviews as possible you contribute to a bigger Night Community.Be a member NOW!
